title: Expo EAS Update executor
description: Start an EAS update for your expo project.

branch.description: Branch to publish the update group on

message.description: A short message describing the update

republish.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

skipBundler.description: Skip running Expo CLI to bundle the app before publishing

platform.description: The platform to build the app, example values: ios, android, all.

json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

auto.description: Use the current git branch and commit message for the EAS branch and update message

privateKeyPath.description: File containing the PEM-encoded private key corresponding to the certificate in expo-updates' configuration. Defaults to a file named "private-key.pem" in the certificate's directory.
